edition.heading: 2022 Edition
edition.text: Scambi Festival 2022 will take place from 25th to 28th of August in the most ancient neighborhood of Sanremo: **La Pigna**, we chose ***Disequilibrium*** as its theme.

paneuretic.heading: What does *Paneuretic* mean?
paneuretic.text: *Paneuretic* is a neologism we created to synthetize the meaning and values of Scambi. It derives from the Greek pan (all), eurisko (discover) and ethos (ethical living). We wish to combine diverse realities that would never meet in their original contexts, while celebrating and respecting our differences, discovering and developing inspiring ideas.

family.heading: The Scambi Family
text: We are a group of under 25s coming from every corner of the world.

Our association was born from our wish to value **real** and **deep ties**, horizontality and dialogue, curiosity and welcoming of diversity. After lots of videocalls, thousand doubts and just as many ideas, <u>our staff has become a family</u>. We are proud of our etherogeneity and passion, we are enthusiastic in sharing inspiration and in continuously proposing new perspectives.
We will be waiting for you in Sanremo, to introduce ourselves properly. In the meanwhile, [here is](/about-us 'About us') who we are.

purpose: Our purpose is to recover the value of meaningful **communication** and conscious **meeting**, often forgotten or hidden behind a two-dimentional screen. <u>Scambi is a multi-dimensional universe</u>, where distant worlds have the possibility to interact with each other.

activities.title: Labs
activities.description: Labs are collective experiences led by experts who accompany participants us a variety of fields with the purpose of discovering new things and people in an unique way, in order to develop new bonds and values.

activities.title: Pinoli
activities.description: Pinoli are events where you can meet new people: book presentations, exhibitions of innovative technological solutions, exchanges of secondhand clothing, and much more.

activities.title: <cite lang='it'>Dissolvenze</cite>
activities.description: <cite lang='it'>Dissolvenze</cite> is our short film contest, through which creatives share their views and voice their ideas thanks to the magic of pictures.

testimonials.title: What drives the members of our staff

data.name: Anna
data.quote: To me, Scambi is where I can be free and be hopeful for the future; in these confusing and uncertain times we all need to go back to focusing on what living together really means.

data.name: Luce
data.quote: I decided to join Scambi because I saw what last year the team was able to create thanks to everybodys dedication and commitment, and I would d love to help to recreate the same magic for the next edition of the festival.

data.name: Luisa
data.quote: I like Scambi because it brought together young people from all over Italy with the goal of inventing something new, of combining music, dancing and a lot of curiosity.
